cluster_classes.class_description: Major metallurgical families of stainless steels, such as austenitic, ferritic, martensitic, and duplex types, grouped by their microstructure and alloying elements.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic stainless steels are specific families within stainless steels.

cluster_classes.class_description: Parent category for metallurgical structure types in steels, grouping austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic structures. This class should not directly contain entities, but should serve as a container for the specific structure classes below.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Austenitic, ferritic, and martensitic are metallurgical structures in steels.
remarks: This class is a parent category and should not directly contain entities; it should group the specific structure classes below.
This class is a parent grouping and should not directly contain entities; ensure it is used only as a container for the specific structure classes.
This class is a schema-level parent and should be enforced as an abstract/container class, not for direct entity assignment.

args.new_description: Unified class for major metallurgical families and structure types in steels, including austenitic, ferritic, martensitic, and duplex, grouped by microstructure and alloying elements. Serves as a parent category for specific structure classes.
args.justification: Both classes describe the same high-level metallurgical groupings in steels (austenitic, ferritic, martensitic, duplex), with overlapping scope and no entities; maintaining two is redundant.
args.remark: Merged to eliminate redundant parent/umbrella classes for steel metallurgical families/structures.

args.justification: Assigning canonical Class_Group to merged class for schema consistency.

executed_decisions.justification: Both classes describe the same high-level metallurgical groupings in steels (austenitic, ferritic, martensitic, duplex), with overlapping scope and no entities; maintaining two is redundant.
executed_decisions.remark: Merged to eliminate redundant parent/umbrella classes for steel metallurgical families/structures.

executed_decisions.justification: Assigning canonical Class_Group to merged class for schema consistency.
